title: Elegant Diamond Vaddanam Chain Pendant
materials: G-H color). Features a durable and lustrous finish.
features: Modern interpretation of the traditional Vaddanam. Intricate pave setting showcasing numerous small diamonds. Symmetrical design with diamond accents. The locket is designed to be paired with a gold or diamond chain of your choice.
colors: Rose Gold with sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a sophisticated everyday accessory.
description: Contemporary design meets traditional inspiration, making this pendant a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail, ensuring lasting beauty and durability. The diamond embellishments add a touch of luxury and glamour. Perfect for gifting.
